attributes.action: Ensure the electrification of the rail network does not mean guards and conductors lose their jobs because of driver only operation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: please ensure that when any train line is being changed to electric that you get a commitment from the train operating companies, not only for the duration of their term but for ever more that they will not make the train a driver only operation and do away with the guard/conductor. ticket examiners are not trained to deal with any safety issues on a train and we must strive to keep a fully trained guard/conductor on all trains at all times.       electrification should not mean driver only operation.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
